column1: 399512,"Camera Operator (Film, Television or Video)",,"Set up still or video cameras or related equipment
column3: Operate still or video cameras or related equipment
column5: Determine technical requirements of productions or projects
column7: Operate communications, transmissions or broadcasting equipment
column11: Edit audio, photographs or video recordings
column13: Collaborate with others to determine technical details of productions
column17: Manage content of broadcasts or presentations
column21: Set up and operate lighting equipment
column29: Review details of technical drawings or specifications
column31: Supervise technical operations of production to ensure creative direction is realised
column35: Maintain inventories of materials, equipment or products
column41: Convert data among multiple digital or analogue formats
